auth.midware.privateRoute: Page available only for authenticated users
auth.midware.publicRoute: Page available only for guest users
auth.midware.userNotFound: User not found or hasn't not created yet
auth.error.userNotFound: User not found or hasn't not created yet
auth.error.userExists: User with this email already exists. Use password recovery or enter another email
auth.error.invalidToken: Access token is not valid or has already been used
auth.success.registerMessage: An instruction on completing registration has been sent to your email
auth.success.emailConfirmMessage: Registration complete, your account verified successful!
auth.success.passwordResetMessage: An instruction on completing password recovery has been sent to your email
email.register.subject: Register confirm | SmartDesk
email.register.title: {{name}}, welcome on board!
email.register.subtitle: Verify your email to finish registration
email.register.hint: Thank you for choosing SmartDesk.io. Click on the button below to complete registration
email.register.warning: If you didn’t ask for register new account, please ignore this email.
email.register.description: You receive this email because you or someone initiated register operation on SmartDesk website.
email.passwordRecovery.subject: Password recovery | SmartDesk
email.passwordRecovery.title: {{name}}, recover your password.
email.passwordRecovery.subtitle: Looks like you lost your password?
email.passwordRecovery.hint: We’re here to help. Click on the button below to change your password.
email.passwordRecovery.warning: If you didn’t ask to recover your password, please ignore this email.
email.passwordRecovery.description: You receive this email because you or someone initiated a password recovery operation on your SmartDesk account.
